reviewText: Loved it, End of the Series. Still whackie, great fun.
Final end to finish off a very funny series Box Set. But you might want to look for the OVA releases

Hare + Guu v. 7 The entire Hare + Guu series [box set and two specials DVDs] is a real gem for anime fans enjoying laughs with a great storyline. I am very happy I got the entire series and specials [background information in story form]. The twists of story are masterful. It is humor within a normal/bizarre world, but very funny.
